name: Fey Wanderer
description: Blessed by fey magic, you stride between the mortal world and the Feywild.

3.name: Dreadful Strikes
3.description: Once per turn, deal an extra 1d4 psychic damage when you hit with a weapon.

3.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
3.description: Gain additional spells such as charm person, misty step, and more at higher levels.

3.name: Otherworldly Glamour
3.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to Charisma checks and gain proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion.

7.name: Beguiling Twist
7.description: When you or an ally succeeds on a save against being charmed or frightened, you can force another creature to make a Wisdom save or be charmed or frightened.

11.name: Fey Reinforcements
11.description: You can cast summon fey without material components and once per long rest without expending a spell slot, optionally without concentration.

15.name: Misty Wanderer
15.description: Cast misty step a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier each long rest and bring a willing creature with you.
